prompt: Photorealistic close-up of an antique sterling silver spoon handle resting on a dark wood surface, a jeweler's loupe held by careful hands is positioned directly over an intricate hallmark stamp, magnifying the tiny details. Soft, focused studio lighting illuminates the hallmark and the texture of the aged silver. Shallow depth of field blurs the background slightly, hinting at more silverware pieces. Professional, informative tone. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-silverware-image-1.png

prompt: A wide, clean composition comparing two antique forks side-by-side on a neutral grey background, landscape orientation. The fork on the left is heavily tarnished silverplate, showing wear and base metal peeking through. The fork on the right is brightly polished sterling silver, reflecting light cleanly. Even, bright studio lighting clearly highlights the differences in condition and material. Photorealistic, comparative style. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-silverware-image-2.png

prompt: An elegant flat lay arrangement of various antique sterling silverware pieces (ornate forks, spoons, a butter knife, a sugar shell) spread across a rich, dark velvet cloth within the landscape frame. Some pieces show light tarnish, others are polished. Warm, slightly dramatic directional lighting creates soft shadows and highlights the intricate patterns and reflective surfaces, suggesting inherent value and history. Photorealistic, moody, luxurious feel. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-silverware-image-3.png

prompt: A pile of assorted, common, slightly worn old silverware (mostly spoons and forks, mismatched patterns) sits on the platform of a modern digital kitchen scale, positioned slightly off-center in the wide frame. The scale's bright LCD readout clearly displays a weight measurement (e.g., '450g'). Clean, neutral overhead lighting. Focus is on the scale and the bulk quantity of silver, representing melt value assessment. Photorealistic, practical, objective style. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-silverware-image-4.png

prompt: Extreme macro photograph capturing the intricate floral relief pattern on the handle of an ornate, antique sterling silver serving spoon. The handle stretches horizontally across the 16:9 frame. Sharp focus reveals minute details, craftsmanship, and the subtle patina within the crevices. Soft, diffused lighting emphasizes the texture and form of the silver artistry. Very shallow depth of field completely blurs the background. Photorealistic, detailed, artistic focus on craftsmanship. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-silverware-image-5.png
